rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands from the top of your library.
Once during each of your turns, if you haven't cast a spell from your hand this turn, you may cast a spell with mana value 3 or less from the top of your library without paying its mana cost. When you cast a spell this way, you can't cast spells from your hand this turn.
